species.name: pansage
descriptions: It’s good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It’s kind enough to share them with friends.
It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

abilities.name: overgrow
abilities.effect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
